title: Everybody LOVES... Korean Braised Short Ribs | Pass that Galbi Jjim!!

Today, Daniel shows you how to make a classic Korean holiday dish called Galbi Jjim! It's a go-to holiday dish for many Koreans. I will teach you how to make an incredible version - one that you're family will be asking for seconds (the next day!). We start by making an addictive marinade sauce and then soak beef short ribs in it for 24 hours. Then we'll add some water to it and reduce it until they get nice and tender. It's simple, delicious and perfect for a warm Holiday meal.
